title: How Trump has forever changed the Republican Party
itunes:title: How Trump has forever changed the Republican Party
description:
Gerald F. Seib writes for the Wall Street Journal that Donald Trump has fundamentally reshaped the Republican Party. And, in the Washington Post, Ashley Parker says the president’s “outsider” messaging needs to pivot to that of an incumbent.

 

ProPublica reports that election officials are fielding harassment and threats from both ends of the political spectrum.

 

The Atlantic has an essay by two Brooklyn high school teachers explaining why they may go on strike over school reopening plans.

 

And it’s Kobe Bryant Day. The LA Times explains how the Lakers and the wider basketball world are honoring the late star.
